oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Contracts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Housing contract. Al-Shaykh 'Abd Allah has agreed to let the entire first floor in the Glaziers' residence that is in the Jewish quarter to the teacher Shmuel Ibn Musa adh-dhimmi (the dhimmi, free non-Muslim subject living in a Muslim country) al-yahudi (the Jew) ar-Rumi (the Romaean/Byzantine/Greek). The entire sum should be paid each year at the beginning of the year. Vertically to the right side of this contract appear the signatures of the clerk and the witness and a stamp.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Arabic document
